p: The sequences were aligned using the Mafft 7 algorithm in Aliview 1.17.1 alignment viewer and editor software [ 20, 21]. Phylogenetic analyses were performed using the MEGA 6.06 software and the phylogenetic trees were generated by the maximum likelihood method with GTR + I + G4 nucleotide substitution model in jModelTest v. 2.1 [ 22] with 1000 bootstraps. Evolutionary distances were calculated using the Kimura 2-parameter model [ 23].
